review: Works well. I bought the fire stick for my bedroom TV and it fits my needs. I would suggest if you are going to be a heavy user of Fire TV, to buy the box version for a few bucks more. I watch an hour or two a day from the stick, and all other viewing is done at the Fire TV box.I do not have any experience with the other devices for streaming, but will say that this stick boots quickly and it's easy to navigate. I wish it came with the audible search remote.
